Package com.trading.application.stock.service

Class StockService

java.lang.Object
com.trading.application.stock.service.StockService
@Service public class StockService extends Object
Stock Service class for handling stock-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getStockOverview

      @Retryable(retryFor={java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException.class,java.lang.InterruptedException.class}, maxAttempts=2, backoff=@Backoff(delay=100L)) @Cacheable(key="#stockTicker", cacheNames="companyOverview") public Stock getStockOverview(String stockTicker)
      Retrieves stock overview information for a given stock ticker.
      Parameters:
      stockTicker - The stock ticker for which overview information is to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A Stock object containing overview details.
